com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document

Class SpenPaintingDoc

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.document.SpenPaintingDoc

  • public final class SpenPaintingDoc
extends Object
    PaintingDoc document Class
    This class contains all the data in the Painting Canvas. It manages the objects in the PaintingDoc and provides the command history for undo and redo commands.
    Since:
    5.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for receiving history events.
      The interface receives notifications when a new history event is committed by commitHistory(HistoryUpdateInfo)
      static class  SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo
      This class contains the update history information.
      static interface  SpenPaintingDoc.LayerListener
      This listener interface is called when the state of a layer is changed.
      static interface  SpenPaintingDoc.ObjectListener
      This listener interface is called when the state of an object is changed.

      SpenPaintingDoc(Context context, int width, int height, String filePath)
      Creates a SpenPaintingDoc instance with the specified file path.
      If file is existed, then load the file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendLayer(int id)
      Add a new layer with the specified ID.
      The ID of the default layer for a PaintingDoc is 0.
      void appendObject(SpenObjectBase object)
      Add the specified object to the current layer of the PaintingDoc document.
      The add object action is recorded in the history stack.
      void attachToFile(String filePath)
      Save all data and attach the saved data to given file.
      void clearHistory()
      Clear all the undo/redo history.
      Even if undoable or redoable is cleared by this API, history listener is not called.
      void clearHistoryTag()
      Clear the history tag.
      void clearRedoHistory()
      Clear all the redo commands.
      void close()
      Close the PaintingDoc.
      void close(boolean removeCache)
      Close the PaintingDoc.
      SpenObjectBase createObject(int type)
      Create a new instance of the specified object type.
      void discard()
      Discard the PaintingDoc instance.
      boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares the instance with the specified object and returns whether both is same or not.
      ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> findObjectAtPosition(float x, float y)
      Find the list of objects at the specified location.
      Objects within object containers cannot be found.
      ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> findObjectAtPosition(float x, float y, float threshold)
      Find the list of objects in the range.
      The range is the rectangle of (x-threshold, y-threshold) to (x+threshold, y+threshold).
      ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> findObjectInClosedCurve(PointF[] points)
      Find the objects contained in the closed curves defined by the specified points.
      The points connect the curve in order.
      If the curve does not intersect, this method connects the first point and the last point.
      If two points overlap, one of them is ignored and the next point is connected.
      Objects within object containers cannot be found.
      ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> findObjectInRect(RectF rectf, boolean allAreas)
      Find the objects in the rectangle with the specified points.
      Objects within object containers cannot be found.
      SpenObjectBase findTopObjectAtPosition(float x, float y)
      Find the topmost object at the specified position.
      Objects within object containers cannot be found.
      SpenObjectBase findTopObjectAtPosition(float x, float y, float threshold)
      Find the topmost object in the range.
      The range is the rectangle of (x-threshold, y-threshold) to (x+threshold, y+threshold).
      int getBackgroundColor()
      Get the background color.
      Bitmap getBackgroundImage()
      Get the background image.
      int getBackgroundImageMode()
      Get the background image mode.
      String getBackgroundImagePath()
      Get the background image file path.
      int getCurrentLayerId()
      Get the ID of the current layer.
      RectF getDrawnRectOfAllObject()
      Get the total drawn rect of all the objects that fill the PaintingDoc.
      If there are too many objects on the PaintingDoc, this method becomes slow.
      But if there is no change in the PaintingDoc, this method returns the result quickly because no recalculation is required.

      Get the PaintingDoc height.
      String getId()
      Get the PaintingDoc ID.
      long getLastEditedTime()
      Gets the time the PaintingDoc instance or its objects were last edited.
      If nothing has changed, this method gets the time when the PaintingDoc was created.

      Get the number of layers.

      Get the index of the specified object in the current layer of the PaintingDoc document.

      Get the objects's rect list contained in PaintingDoc.
      Objects within object containers cannot be found.

      Get the PaintingDoc orientation.

      Get the width and height of the specified file.

      Get the limit for the undo commands.

      Get the PaintingDoc width.

      Check if extra byte array data exists with the specified key.

      Check if extra integer data exists with the specified key.

      Check if extra string data exists with the specified key.

      Check if extra string array data exists with the specified key.
      int hashCode()
      Gets an integer hash code for this object.
      void insertLayer(int id, int index)
      Insert a new layer at the specified index with the specified ID.
      The ID of the default layer for a PaintingDoc is 0.
      boolean isAllObjectsLoaded()
      Check if the all objects are loaded.
      boolean isChanged()
      Check if the PaintingDoc, layers or objects have changed.
      boolean isLayerChanged()
      Check if there is a change in the layer.
      boolean isLayerEventForwardEnabled(int id)
      Check if event forwarding is enabled for the specified layer.
      boolean isLayerVisible(int id)
      Check if the specific layer is visible.
      boolean isObjectContained(SpenObjectBase object)
      Check if the specified object is contained in the current layer of the PaintingDoc document.
      boolean isObjectLoaded()
      Check if the objects are loaded.
      boolean isRedoable()
      Check if the action is redoable.
      Check if the redo stack in the history manager is empty.
      If it is empty, there is no command to redo, and the method returns false.
      If it is not empty, it returns true.
      Always use this method before calling paintingDoc.redo().
      boolean isReplayable()
      Get replayable property
      boolean isUndoable()
      Check if the action is undoable.
      Check if the undo stack in the history manager is empty.
      If it is empty, there is no command to undo, and this method returns false.
      If it is not empty, it returns true.
      Always call this method before calling paintingDoc.undo().
      static boolean isValid(String filePath)
      Check if the specified file is a valid SPP file.
      void loadAllObjects()
      Load all objects from all packed data.
      When a PaintingDoc is first created, the isObjectLoaded() method returns true, but if you create a PaintingDoc with an SPP file, the isObjectLoaded() method returns false.
      void loadObject()
      Load objects from current packed data.
      When a PaintingDoc is first created, the isObjectLoaded() method returns true, but if you create a PaintingDoc with an SPP file, the isObjectLoaded() method returns false.
      void moveLayerIndex(int id, int step)
      Change the order of specific layer.
      SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] redo()
      Redo the command and return the changed state information for updating the canvas.
      After redo, the canvas view needs to be updated.
      SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] redoAll()
      Redo all the commands in the redo stack of the history manager and return the changed state information for updating the canvas.
      After redoAll, the canvas view needs to be updated.
      void removeAllObject()
      Remove all the objects from the current layer and the selected object list of the PaintingDoc document.
      The remove all objects action is not recorded in the history stack.
      void removeExtraDataByteArray(String key)
      Remove the extra byte array data with the specified key.
      void removeExtraDataInt(String key)
      Remove the extra integer data with the specified key.
      void removeExtraDataString(String key)
      Remove the extra string data with the specified key.
      void removeExtraDataStringArray(String key)
      Remove the extra string array data with the specified key.
      void removeLayer(int id)
      Remove the specified layer.
      You cannot remove all the layers.
      If a current layer is removed from the PaintingDoc, the layer in front of the layer becomes the current layer.
      For example, if the current layer is Layer 2 and it is removed, Layer 3 becomes the current layer.
      0 - 1 - [2] - 3 - 4 (currnt layer is 2, removes 2 layer )
      0 - 1 - [3] - 4 (current layer is 3)
      If you call this method after calling the SpenPaintingView#setPaintingDoc(SpenPaintingDoc, boolean) method, this layer is drawn on SpenPaintingView after SpenPaintingView#update().
      void save(String filepath)
      Save the PaintingDoc data to a file.
      void setBackgroundColor(int color)
      Set the specified background color.
      void setBackgroundImage(String filePath)
      Set the image from the specified file.
      This method copies the original image file into the SPD file.
      void setBackgroundImageMode(int mode)
      Set the specified background image mode.
      void setCurrentLayer(int id)
      Set the specified layer as the current layer.
      Note : The selected object list is canceled.
      void setExtraDataByteArray(String key, byte[] value)
      Set the extra byte array data with the specified key.
      void setExtraDataInt(String key, int value)
      Set the extra integer data with the specified key.
      void setExtraDataString(String key, String value)
      Set the extra string data with the specified key.
      void setExtraDataStringArray(String key, String[] value)
      Set the extra string array data with the specified key.
      void setForegroundImage(Bitmap bitmap)
      Set the image from the specified bitmap.
      void setForegroundImage(String filePath)
      Set the image from the specified file.
      This method copies the original image file into the SPD file.
      void setHistoryListener(SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryListener listener)
      Set the specified HistoryListener instance to receive history events.
      void setHistoryTag()
      Set a tag for the history manager.
      To remove the tag, call clearTag or undoToTag.
      void setLayerEventForwardEnabled(int id, boolean enable)
      Enable or disable event forwarding for the specified layer.
      Set to true to enable the layer to forward unprocessable events to the lower layer, set to false to disable layer event forwarding.
      void setLayerListener(SpenPaintingDoc.LayerListener listener)
      Set the specified LayerListener instance to receive layer events.
      void setLayerName(int id, String name)
      Set the specified name for the specified layer.
      void setLayerVisibility(int id, boolean visible)
      Show or hide the specific layer.
      void setObjectListener(SpenPaintingDoc.ObjectListener listener)
      Set the specified ObjectListener instance to receive object events on the PaintingDoc.
      void setReplayable(boolean replayable)
      Set replayable property
      void setUndoLimit(int undoLimit)
      Set the limit for the number of undo commands in the undo stack.
      void setVolatileBackgroundImage(Bitmap bitmap)
      Set the specified image as the volatile background image.
      This means the background image is not saved in the SPD file.
      void startHistoryGroup()
      Create a history group.
      A number of histories belong to a single history group, not merge into a single history.
      void stopHistoryGroup()
      Close the history group.
      SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] undo()
      Undo the command and return the previous state information for updating the canvas.
      After undo, the canvas view needs to be updated.
      SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] undoAll()
      Undo all the commands in the undo stack of the history manager and return the previous state information for updating the canvas.
      After undoAll, the canvas view needs to be updated.
      SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] undoToTag()
      Undo the command to the tag and return the previous state information for updating the canvas.
      After undoToTag, the redo stack is cleared and the canvas view needs to be updated.
      Note: If history tag out of the undo stack, it will be removed.
      void unloadObject()
      Unload the objects in the PaintingDoc which is not being attached to view.
      This method saves the objects and layers on the PaintingDoc in the cache directory and unloads them from memory.
      The unloaded objects cannot be used any more.
      When objects are unloaded, the methods for the objects trigger the loadObject method internally.
      You cannot use methods that receive an unloaded object instance as their parameter.
      The command history stack for the unloaded objects is cleared.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenPaintingDoc

        public SpenPaintingDoc(Context context,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       String filePath)
                throws IOException
        Creates a SpenPaintingDoc instance with the specified file path.
        If file is existed, then load the file. If not, creates a new file with given width and height.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        width - The SpenPaintingDoc width in pixels.
        height - The SpenPaintingDoc height in pixels.
        filePath - The absolute path of the file.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the cache directory is not generated.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getLastEditedTime

        public long getLastEditedTime()
        Gets the time the PaintingDoc instance or its objects were last edited.
        If nothing has changed, this method gets the time when the PaintingDoc was created.
        Returns:
        The Unix epoch time in microseconds.
        Since:

      • appendObject

        public void appendObject(SpenObjectBase object)
        Add the specified object to the current layer of the PaintingDoc document.
        The add object action is recorded in the history stack.
        Parameters:
        object - The object that you want to add. The valid type of object is SpenObjectBase.TYPE_STROKE only.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the object has already been added.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the object is null or not an ObjectStroke
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • removeAllObject

        Remove all the objects from the current layer and the selected object list of the PaintingDoc document.
        The remove all objects action is not recorded in the history stack.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • findObjectInClosedCurve

        public ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> findObjectInClosedCurve(PointF[] points)
        Find the objects contained in the closed curves defined by the specified points.
        The points connect the curve in order.
        If the curve does not intersect, this method connects the first point and the last point.
        If two points overlap, one of them is ignored and the next point is connected.
        Objects within object containers cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        points - The point array that defines the curves.
        Returns:
        The object list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the arguments passed are invalid.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • findObjectInRect

        public ArrayList<SpenObjectBase> findObjectInRect(RectF rectf,
                                                  boolean allAreas)
        Find the objects in the rectangle with the specified points.
        Objects within object containers cannot be found.
        Parameters:
        rectf - The rect to find the objects.
        allAreas - Set to true to find the objects that only are within the rectf, set to false to include the objects that partially overlap with the rectf.
        Returns:
        The object list.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If you set invalid
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • setVolatileBackgroundImage

        public void setVolatileBackgroundImage(Bitmap bitmap)
        Set the specified image as the volatile background image.
        This means the background image is not saved in the SPD file.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The image bitmap.
        Set this to null to initialize the background image.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the bitmap passed is a recycled image.
        Since:
        5.0.0

        This method copies the original image file into the SPD file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - The image file path.
        Set this to null to initialize the background image.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the file path passed is invalid or if the file does not exist.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getId

        public String getId()
        Get the PaintingDoc ID.
        Returns:
        The ID.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • getDrawnRectOfAllObject

        public RectF getDrawnRectOfAllObject()
        Get the total drawn rect of all the objects that fill the PaintingDoc.
        If there are too many objects on the PaintingDoc, this method becomes slow.
        But if there is no change in the PaintingDoc, this method returns the result quickly because no recalculation is required.
        Returns:
        The union rect of all objects in the PaintingDoc.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • isChanged

        public boolean isChanged()
        Check if the PaintingDoc, layers or objects have changed.
        Returns:
        true if the PaintingDoc, layers or objects have changed.
        false if the PaintingDoc, layers or objects have not changed.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • loadObject

        public void loadObject()
                throws IOException
        Load objects from current packed data.
        When a PaintingDoc is first created, the isObjectLoaded() method returns true, but if you create a PaintingDoc with an SPP file, the isObjectLoaded() method returns false.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the PaintingDoc file is not found.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        isObjectLoaded(), unloadObject()

      • loadAllObjects

        public void loadAllObjects()
                    throws IOException
        Load all objects from all packed data.
        When a PaintingDoc is first created, the isObjectLoaded() method returns true, but if you create a PaintingDoc with an SPP file, the isObjectLoaded() method returns false.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the PaintingDoc file is not found.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        isObjectLoaded(), unloadObject()

      • unloadObject

        public void unloadObject()
                  throws IOException
        Unload the objects in the PaintingDoc which is not being attached to view.
        This method saves the objects and layers on the PaintingDoc in the cache directory and unloads them from memory.
        The unloaded objects cannot be used any more.
        When objects are unloaded, the methods for the objects trigger the loadObject method internally.
        You cannot use methods that receive an unloaded object instance as their parameter.
        The command history stack for the unloaded objects is cleared.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the isObjectLoaded() method returns false.
        IOException - Thrown if the PaintingDoc file is not found.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        isObjectLoaded(), loadObject()

      • isObjectLoaded

        public boolean isObjectLoaded()
        Check if the objects are loaded.
        Returns:
        true if objects are loaded. false if objects are not loaded.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • isAllObjectsLoaded

        public boolean isAllObjectsLoaded()
        Check if the all objects are loaded.
        Returns:
        true if objects are loaded. false if objects are not loaded.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • appendLayer

        public void appendLayer(int id)
                 throws OutOfMemoryError
        Add a new layer with the specified ID.
        The ID of the default layer for a PaintingDoc is 0. Do not use 0 for the ID of first new layer.
        If you call this method after calling the SpenPaintingView#setPaintingDoc(SpenPaintingDoc, boolean) method, this layer is drawn on SpenView after SpenPaintingView#update().
        This method takes up a lot of memory. If enough there is insufficient memory available, an out of memory exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID for the new layer.
        Throws:
        OutOfMemoryError - Throws if out of memory error
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the ID already exists.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the ID is less than 0.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • insertLayer

        public void insertLayer(int id,
                        int index)
        Insert a new layer at the specified index with the specified ID.
        The ID of the default layer for a PaintingDoc is 0. Do not use 0 for the ID of first new layer.
        If you call this method after calling the SpenPaintingView#setPaintingDoc(SpenPaintingDoc, boolean) method, this layer is drawn on SpenPaintingView after SpenPaintingView#update().
        This method takes up a lot of memory. If enough there is insufficient memory available, an out of memory exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID for the new layer.
        index - The index where the layer is inserted.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the ID already exists.
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the ID is less than 0.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if index is less than 0 or greater than total number of layers on PaintingDoc.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • removeLayer

        public void removeLayer(int id)
        Remove the specified layer.
        You cannot remove all the layers.
        If a current layer is removed from the PaintingDoc, the layer in front of the layer becomes the current layer.
        For example, if the current layer is Layer 2 and it is removed, Layer 3 becomes the current layer.
        0 - 1 - [2] - 3 - 4 (currnt layer is 2, removes 2 layer )
        0 - 1 - [3] - 4 (current layer is 3)
        If you call this method after calling the SpenPaintingView#setPaintingDoc(SpenPaintingDoc, boolean) method, this layer is drawn on SpenPaintingView after SpenPaintingView#update().
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the layer.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if there is only one layer.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • moveLayerIndex

      • setLayerEventForwardEnabled

        public void setLayerEventForwardEnabled(int id,
                                        boolean enable)
        Enable or disable event forwarding for the specified layer.
        Set to true to enable the layer to forward unprocessable events to the lower layer, set to false to disable layer event forwarding.
        Parameters:
        id - The layer ID.
        enable - Set to true to enable the layer to forward unprocessable events to the lower layer, set to false to disable layer event forwarding.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the ID passed is invalid.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • isUndoable

        public boolean isUndoable()
        Check if the action is undoable.
        Check if the undo stack in the history manager is empty.
        If it is empty, there is no command to undo, and this method returns false.
        If it is not empty, it returns true.
        Always call this method before calling paintingDoc.undo(). 
         if (paintingDoc.isUndoable() == true) {
 spenSurfaceView.updateUndo(paintingDoc.undo());
 }
        Returns:
        true if the undo stack is not empty.
        false if the undo stack is empty.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        undo()

      • isRedoable

        public boolean isRedoable()
        Check if the action is redoable.
        Check if the redo stack in the history manager is empty.
        If it is empty, there is no command to redo, and the method returns false.
        If it is not empty, it returns true.
        Always use this method before calling paintingDoc.redo(). 
         if (paintingDoc.isRedoable() == true) {
 spenSurfaceView.updateRedo(paintingDoc.redo());
 }
        Returns:
        true if the redo stack is not empty.
        false if the redo stack is empty.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        redo()

      • undo

        public SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] undo()
        Undo the command and return the previous state information for updating the canvas.
        After undo, the canvas view needs to be updated. 
         if (paintingDoc.isUodoable() == true) {
 spenSurfaceView.updateUndo(paintingDoc.undo());
 }
        Returns:
        The history information array for updating the canvas.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        isUndoable()

      • redo

        public SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] redo()
        Redo the command and return the changed state information for updating the canvas.
        After redo, the canvas view needs to be updated. 
         if (paintingDoc.isRedoable() == true) {
 spenSurfaceView.updateRedo(paintingDoc.redo());
 }
        Returns:
        The history information array for updating the canvas.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        isRedoable()

      • undoAll

        public SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] undoAll()
        Undo all the commands in the undo stack of the history manager and return the previous state information for updating the canvas.
        After undoAll, the canvas view needs to be updated. 
         onClickbutton(State state, Button button) {
 if(state == LONG_PRESS && button = undoButton) {
 spenSurfaceView.updateUndo(paintingDoc.undoAll());
 }
 }
        Returns:
        The history information array for updating the canvas.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        undo()

      • redoAll

        public SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] redoAll()
        Redo all the commands in the redo stack of the history manager and return the changed state information for updating the canvas.
        After redoAll, the canvas view needs to be updated. 
         onClickbutton(State state, Button button) {
 if(state == LONG_PRESS && button = redoButton) {
 spenSurfaceView.updateRedo(paintingDoc.redoAll());
 }
 }
        Returns:
        The history information array for updating the canvas.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        redo()

      • setUndoLimit

        public void setUndoLimit(int undoLimit)
        Set the limit for the number of undo commands in the undo stack. The default value is 50.
        The 51st command pushes, the first command out of the undo stack of the history manager if the limit is set to 50.
        Use this method to change the limit. 
         paintingDoc.setUndoLimit(100);
        Parameters:
        undoLimit - The undo command limit.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        getUndoLimit()

      • getUndoLimit

        public int getUndoLimit()
        Get the limit for the undo commands. 
         if (paintingDoc.getLimit() == 0) {
 paintingDoc.setUndoLimit(100);
 }
        Returns:
        The limit for the undo commands.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        setUndoLimit(int)

      • clearHistory

        public void clearHistory()
        Clear all the undo/redo history.
        Even if undoable or redoable is cleared by this API, history listener is not called.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        setHistoryListener(HistoryListener)

      • setHistoryTag

        public void setHistoryTag()
        Set a tag for the history manager.
        To remove the tag, call clearTag or undoToTag.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        undoToTag(), clearHistoryTag()

      • clearHistoryTag

        public void clearHistoryTag()
        Clear the history tag.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        setHistoryTag()

      • undoToTag

        public SpenPaintingDoc.HistoryUpdateInfo[] undoToTag()
        Undo the command to the tag and return the previous state information for updating the canvas.
        After undoToTag, the redo stack is cleared and the canvas view needs to be updated.
        Note: If history tag out of the undo stack, it will be removed.
        Returns:
        The history information array for updating the canvas.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if there is no history tag or history tag out of the undo stack.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        setHistoryTag()

      • startHistoryGroup

        public void startHistoryGroup()
        Create a history group.
        A number of histories belong to a single history group, not merge into a single history. This history group is the unit of undo/redo within the range of undolimit. The "stopHistoryGroup" is should be called after "startHistoryGroup()"
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        stopHistoryGroup()

      • stopHistoryGroup

        public void stopHistoryGroup()
        Close the history group. A number of histories are integrated into a single histroy group. This history group is the unit of undo/redo. The "stopHistoryGroup" is should be called after "startHistoryGroup()"
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the PaintingDoc document stops history group without start.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        startHistoryGroup()

        type - The object type.
        The valid value is SpenObjectBase.TYPE_STROKE only
        Returns:
        The new object instance. If the type parameter is invalid, this method returns null.
        Since:
        5.0.0

                  throws IOException

        Parameters:

        IOException - Thrown if the file is not saved successfully.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the filePath is invalid.
        Since:
        5.0.0

      • discard

        public void discard()
             throws IOException
        Discard the PaintingDoc instance.
        This method deletes the new data before closing the PaintingDoc. To close a PaintingDoc, call close() or discard(). If you use the subordinate classes of a PaintingDoc instance after closing it by calling discard(), an exception is thrown. A PaintingDoc cannot be called when it is set (setPaintingDoc) on PaintingView. Initialize the PaintingView with setPaintingDoc(null) before calling it. Close controls before calling a PaintingDoc. You cannot call a PaintingDoc with controls displayed.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the cache directory or its files cannot be deleted.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        close()

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close the PaintingDoc.
        This method deletes all the data of a PaintingDoc before closing it. To close a PaintingDoc, call close() or discard(). If you use the subordinate classes of a PaintingDoc instance after closing it by calling discard(), an exception is thrown. A PaintingDoc cannot be called when it is set (setPaintingDoc) on PaintingView. Initialize the PaintingView with setPaintingDoc(null) before calling it. Close controls before calling a PaintingDoc. You cannot call a PaintingDoc with controls displayed.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the cache directory or its files cannot be deleted.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        discard()

      • close

        public void close(boolean removeCache)
           throws IOException
        Close the PaintingDoc.
        This method deletes all the data of a PaintingDoc before closing it. To close a PaintingDoc, call close() or discard(). If you use the subordinate classes of a PaintingDoc instance after closing it by calling discard(), an exception is thrown. A PaintingDoc cannot be called when it is set (setPaintingDoc) on PaintingView. Initialize the PaintingView with setPaintingDoc(null) before calling it. Close controls before calling a PaintingDoc. You cannot call a PaintingDoc with controls displayed.
        Parameters:
        removeCache - Set to true to remove the cache directory of this PaintingDoc, set to false to not remove the cache directory. If you set true, it cause some latency when you open the PaintingDoc file(.spd) again later. Since the all cache files for this PaintingDoc are removed and all cache files need to be re-created.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the cache directory or its files cannot be deleted.
        Since:
        5.0.0
        See Also:
        discard()
